--(''' The Ubuntu Studio development team regularly meets on the first Sunday of every month at <nowiki>[[http://www.worldtimeserver.com/current_time_in_UTC.aspx|17:00 UTC]]</nowiki> in #ubuntu-meeting on irc.freenode.net''')--

Logs are to be included with agenda after the meeting.  Some older Ubuntu Studio meetings' minutes (logs) can be found on <nowiki>[[UbuntuStudio-Meetings-Minutes]]</nowiki>.
<<BR>><<BR>>

==== Upcoming Meetings ====

--(We're having an impromptu meeting on this coming Monday, 
<nowiki>[[http://www.timeanddate.com/worldclock/fixedtime.html?msg=Ubuntu+Studio+Contributor+Meeting&iso=20120813T14|2 pm (14:00) UTC August 13th 2012]]</nowiki> in #ubuntu-meeting on irc.freenode.net.)--

Initial agenda can be found at <nowiki>[[UbuntuStudio-Meetings-2012August13]]</nowiki>. Please add details to items.
